```
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Iron ore mine at position(3.0, -73.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 3.0, -73.0)
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, -71.5)
- Burner Inserter (position 3.5, -70.5)
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -69.0)
- Burner Inserter (position 5.5, -67.5)
- Transport belt (position 5.5, -68.5)

###Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest (position -14.5, -48.5)

###Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Attempting to harvest stone when there is none nearby
- Ensure there is stone nearby before attempting to harvest it. Check the position and radius of the harvest action.
### Attempting to craft a stone furnace when there is no stone
- Ensure you have stone in your inventory before attempting to craft a stone furnace. Stone is a raw resource that must be gathered first.

NAMESPACE
- No new utility functions were defined in this step.
```
